mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog (user_id, category_id, `top`, create_date, updat_date, title, summary, content, n_like, n_view, n_reply) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{category.id}, #{top}, #{create}, #{update}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO blog_category (user_id, name, n_blog) VALUES (#{user}, #{name}, 0)
INSERT INTO blog_comment (blog_id, user_id, create_date, content, n_like, n_reply) VALUES (#{blog}, #{user.id}, #{create}, #{content}, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO blog_reply (blog_id, comment_id, user_id, create_date, content) VALUES (#{blog}, #{comment}, #{user.id}, #{create}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog SET category_id = #{category.id}, `top` = #{top}, update_date = #{update}, title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{user.id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM blog_category WHERE id = #{category} AND user_id = #{user}
DELETE FROM blog WHERE id = #{blog} AND user_id = #{user}
DELETE FROM blog_like WHERE blog_id = #{blog} AND user_id = #{user}
DELETE FROM blog_comment_like WHERE comment_id = #{comment} AND user_id = #{user}
